text:
@realDonaldTrump 1/
"Record Growth"
Are you fucking kidding?
It's all beyond horrible and it was a momentary blip. 
The "economy" is pretty low on the list of regular people.
They're worried about:
COVID-19 
FEEDING THEIR FAMILIES 
PAYING RENT
PAYING BILLS
UNEMPLOYMENT
Cont.
